Package manager

Interface SecuredAccess

All Known Implementing Classes:
Office, Room
public interface SecuredAccess
Defines an interface used to check security codes. Used for Part 2.
Author:
mdixon

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkCode​(java.lang.String code)
    Check if the given code matches the stored code.
    int getIncorrectAttempts()
    Gets the number of recorded incorrect access attempts made by calling checkCode(String)
    boolean isLockedOut()
    Checks if access has been locked out due to too many incorrect attempts.
    void resetToDefault()
    Resets the stored code to the default value.
    void setCode​(java.lang.String code)
    Sets the currently stored code.

  • Method Details

    • checkCode

      boolean checkCode​(java.lang.String code)
      Check if the given code matches the stored code.
      Parameters:
      code - the candidate code
      Returns:
      true of the codes match, false otherwise

    • setCode

      void setCode​(java.lang.String code)
      Sets the currently stored code.
      Parameters:
      code - the stored code

    • resetToDefault

      void resetToDefault()
      Resets the stored code to the default value.

    • isLockedOut

      boolean isLockedOut()
      Checks if access has been locked out due to too many incorrect attempts.
      Returns:
      true if locked out due to too many attempts

    • getIncorrectAttempts

      int getIncorrectAttempts()
      Gets the number of recorded incorrect access attempts made by calling checkCode(String)
      Returns:
      the number of incorrect access attempts
